text: aur (vah vakt bhee yaad karo) jab qayaamat mein eesa se khuda pharamaeg ki (kyon) ai mariyam ke bete eesa kya tumane logon se ye kah diya tha ki khuda ko chhodakar mujh ko aur meree maan ko khuda bana lo eesa arz karegen subahaan allaah meree to ye majaal na thee ki mai aisee baat munh se nikaaloon jisaka mujhe koee haq na ho (achchha) agar maine kaha hoga to tujhako zarur maaloom hee hoga kyonki too mere dil kee (sab baat) jaanata hai haan alabatta mai tere jee kee baat nahin jaanata (kyonki) isamen to shaq hee nahin ki too hee gaib kee baaten khoob jaanata hai
